DIYPage.hero_title: Yes, You Can Do This Yourself
DIYPage.hero_subtitle: And we want to be honest with you about that.
DIYPage.hero_description: In an era where AI can generate functional code, we believe in transparency. Here's the truth about what you can do on your own and where we provide real value.
DIYPage.videos_intro: You can build the application on your own by following these video groups.
DIYPage.videos_work_in_progress: We are currently working on the videos. Please check back later.
DIYPage.videos_trust: In the meantime, feel free to read the following information to trust our services more.
DIYPage.truth_title: The Reality of AI in Development
DIYPage.truth_intro: AI tools have democratized software development. Today, it's possible to:
truth_items: Generate functional code with ChatGPT, Claude, or Copilot.
Build complete applications using tools like Cursor, Bolt, or Replit.
Create landing pages and websites without writing a single line of code.
Automate complex tasks using no-code/low-code platforms.
DIYPage.truth_conclusion: Many entrepreneurs are already building successful products this way, and that's a great thing.
DIYPage.cost_title: The Hidden Costs of the DIY Approach
DIYPage.cost_subtitle: Let's be honest about the challenges

cost_items.title: The Steep Learning Curve
cost_items.description: It can take weeks or even months to learn the basic concepts of programming, architecture, and deployment.

cost_items.title: Trial and Error
cost_items.description: You can lose hours debugging errors that an experienced developer could solve in minutes.

cost_items.title: Technical Debt
cost_items.description: Architectural decisions that seem right today can become very expensive to fix in the future.

cost_items.title: Your Time is a Valuable Asset
cost_items.description: Every hour you spend on technical problems is an hour you don't invest in growing your business.

DIYPage.value_title: The Value We Bring to the Table
DIYPage.value_subtitle: Why working with us is a smart decision

value_items.title: Experience That Saves You Time
value_items.description: We condense years of experience into quick and effective decisions for your project.

value_items.title: A Complete Team at Your Disposal
value_items.description: You get access to developers, architects, and consultants for a fraction of the cost of hiring them individually.

value_items.title: Scalable Architecture from Day One
value_items.description: We design for growth from the beginning, avoiding costly refactoring in the future.

value_items.title: Focus on What You Do Best
value_items.description: You can focus on your business while we take care of the technical side of things.

comparison_rows.diy: High, with a risk of costly mistakes
comparison_rows.us: Minimized, thanks to our proven experience

comparison_rows.diy: Your time (which is a valuable asset)

comparison_rows.us: Designed for growth from the start

philosophy_items.title: Radical Honesty
philosophy_items.description: We tell you the truth, even if it's not what you want to hear.

philosophy_items.title: Total Transparency
philosophy_items.description: No hidden costs, no empty promises, no smoke and mirrors.

philosophy_items.title: Mutual Growth
philosophy_items.description: We succeed when you succeed. Your success is our success.

philosophy_items.title: Constant Innovation

PrivacyPage.meta_description: Privacy policy of Code Cognition Studio. Learn how we handle your data.
PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: At Code Cognition Studio, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains what data we collect, why, and how we handle it.
PrivacyPage.section_1_content: The entity responsible for processing your data is Code Cognition Studio. For any privacy-related inquiries, you can contact us at info@ccognitions.com.
PrivacyPage.section_2_content: We only collect data you voluntarily provide through our contact form: name, company (optional), email address, and message. This data is used exclusively to respond to your inquiry. We do not create user accounts, profiles, or sell data to third parties. Our server may automatically log technical information such as IP addresses, which is standard for any web server and is used solely for security and operational purposes.
PrivacyPage.section_3_content: This website does not use its own cookies or third-party cookies. It may use strictly necessary technical cookies for basic functionality (such as language preference). We do not use advertising, tracking, or analytics cookies. If this changes in the future, we will update this policy and inform you accordingly.
PrivacyPage.section_4_content: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete any personal data we hold about you. You can also request the limitation of processing or object to the processing of your data. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@ccognitions.com.
PrivacyPage.section_5_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at info@ccognitions.com.

TermsPage.meta_description: Legal notice and terms of use of Code Cognition Studio.
TermsPage.title: Legal Notice
TermsPage.intro: This legal notice regulates the use of the website ccognitions.com, owned by Code Cognition Studio.
TermsPage.section_1_content: This website is informational in nature. The content published here, including blog posts and service descriptions, does not constitute professional advice. The use of this website implies acceptance of these terms.
TermsPage.section_2_content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Code Cognition Studio and is protected by intellectual property laws. Reproduction, distribution, or modification without prior written authorization is prohibited.
TermsPage.section_3_content: The services and content of this website are provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. Code Cognition Studio shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this website.
TermsPage.section_4_content: For any questions regarding this legal notice, please contact us at info@ccognitions.com.

ServicesPage.services_subtitle: Choose the solution that best fits your needs or let us advise you
ServicesPage.bottom_cta_title: Not sure which service you need?

desarrollo-aplicacion-completo.title: Full Application Development
desarrollo-aplicacion-completo.problem: You need an application from scratch but don't know how to manage the entire process: planning, design, architecture, development, testing, and deployment.
desarrollo-aplicacion-completo.solution: We develop your application from start to finish with agile methodology. Includes requirements analysis, UX/UI design, scalable architecture, development with modern technologies, exhaustive testing, and production deployment. We deliver clean, documented, and maintainable code.
desarrollo-aplicacion-completo.benefit: Professional application ready for production without worrying about technical details.

desarrollo-software-dedicado.title: Dedicated Software Development
desarrollo-software-dedicado.problem: You have the design and architecture defined, but need a team that focuses exclusively on implementing the solution efficiently.
desarrollo-software-dedicado.solution: We handle only the development phase with the specifications you provide. We use best coding practices, version control, and continuous delivery. We integrate with your existing systems and work with your preferred technology stack.
desarrollo-software-dedicado.benefit: Agile, quality development without the burden of managing design or architecture.

automatizacion-end-to-end.title: End-to-End Automation
automatizacion-end-to-end.problem: Manual and repetitive processes slow down your operation. You need to automate complex workflows involving multiple systems and decisions.
automatizacion-end-to-end.solution: We design and implement complete automation solutions, API integrations, and intelligent workflows. We automate everything from simple tasks to complex processes requiring decision-making.
automatizacion-end-to-end.benefit: Up to 80% reduction in execution time and elimination of manual errors.

consultoria-inteligencia-artificial.title: Artificial Intelligence Consulting
consultoria-inteligencia-artificial.problem: You want to implement AI in your business but don't know which use cases are viable, what technologies to use, or how to calculate ROI.
consultoria-inteligencia-artificial.solution: We perform a deep analysis of your business processes to identify AI opportunities. We deliver a detailed roadmap with prioritized use cases, cost-benefit estimates, technology recommendations, and a phased implementation plan. Includes proof of concept to validate feasibility.
consultoria-inteligencia-artificial.benefit: Clear AI adoption strategy with demonstrable ROI and minimized risks.

ProjectsPage.meta_description: Success stories and projects completed with our AI-powered development model.
ProjectsPage.title: Our Results
ProjectsPage.subtitle: Success stories that demonstrate the power of our development model.

projects.title: xPoverty: Enterprise Donations Platform
projects.description: Full development of a donations application with C# .NET backend and cross-platform Flutter frontend. Implementation of robust architecture, multiple payment gateway integration (Stripe, DLocal), webhooks, compliance, and optimized deployment on Digital Ocean with CI/CD on GitHub. Includes complete testing suite: unit, integration, and E2E (Flutter Web + Patrol for mobile).

XPovertyPage.hero_subtitle: Robust architecture, multiple payment gateways, and comprehensive testing to transform social impact
XPovertyPage.overview_description: xPoverty is a donations application developed with enterprise-grade architecture that allows non-profit organizations to receive donations securely and efficiently. The project was built with industry best practices, focusing on scalability, security, and user experience.
XPovertyPage.challenge_description: Create a donations platform that could handle multiple international payment gateways, comply with strict compliance requirements, and offer a seamless experience on both web and mobile devices.
challenge_items: Integration of multiple payment gateways (Stripe and DLocal)
Compliance with security and regulatory standards
Reliable webhook system for real-time synchronization
XPovertyPage.solution_description: We developed a robust microservices architecture with C# .NET for the backend, ensuring scalability and maintainability. The frontend was built with Flutter, allowing a single codebase for web, iOS, and Android.
XPovertyPage.solution_backend_description: C# .NET with clean architecture, CQRS pattern, and Entity Framework Core for efficient data management.
XPovertyPage.solution_frontend_description: Flutter with BLoC pattern for state management, ensuring reusable and maintainable code.
XPovertyPage.solution_payments_description: Implementation of Stripe for global markets and DLocal for Latin America, with automatic fallback system.
XPovertyPage.testing_description: We implemented a multi-level testing strategy that ensures code quality and reliability across all layers of the application.
XPovertyPage.testing_unit_description: xUnit for .NET and Flutter Test to validate business logic and individual components.
XPovertyPage.testing_integration_description: Testing of APIs, databases, and external services to ensure correct communication.
XPovertyPage.testing_e2e_description: Flutter Web testing and Patrol for mobile, simulating complete user flows.
XPovertyPage.architecture_description: The project benefited from consultations with multiple specialized code agents and GPTs, carefully evaluating each technical decision to ensure the best long-term solution.

architecture_items.title: Backend Architecture
architecture_items.description: CQRS and Clean Architecture for separation of concerns and easier testing.

architecture_items.title: State Management
architecture_items.description: BLoC pattern in Flutter for predictable and testable state management.

architecture_items.title: Payment Gateway
architecture_items.description: Fallback system between Stripe and DLocal to maximize success rates.

architecture_items.title: Deployment Strategy
architecture_items.description: Digital Ocean with optimized costs and automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions.

XPovertyPage.visit_description: Discover how this platform is transforming social impact through secure and efficient donations.

posts.title: Code Agents Comparison: Copilot vs Claude vs Gemini vs DeepSeek
posts.excerpt: We analyze four popular code agents: GitHub Copilot CLI, Claude Code, Gemini Code Assist, and DeepSeek Coder, comparing their capabilities, costs, and real use cases.

posts.title: Separation of Responsibilities in Code Agent-Assisted Development
posts.excerpt: A technical analysis on how to structure specialized AI agents for backend, frontend, and testing, applying separation of responsibilities to maximize quality and efficiency.

posts.title: Why AI Orchestration is the Future of Software?
